Class GridView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GridView
extends View
    This class defines the GridView, the main grid which is displayed on the view.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    JeanRaymondDaher
    See Also:
    GridViewCell, Serialized Form

        public java.awt.Dimension suggestedSize()
        This method will return the suggested width by taking the number of columns and multiplying it by the cell's width AND the suggested height by taking the number of rows and multiplying it by the cell's height
